Summary: like a second sun but smaller
divs: Sighting Detailsi was in my house and my sistter called me to come and see something weird.i came i on first i thought it was i sun and i tell that to her,but she said no no,look the sun is there.then i did go on the balkony and there it was a sun near that shiny object.i take few pictures,my sistter too,and for about one sec nothing there any more.i didn even had time to see how did it diseapierd.soory for my bad english
